docs.snippet: There were still Columbus Day parades, but they were more about Italian heritage and immigration, and even an indigenous people’s festival with no mention of the navigator....
docs.lead_paragraph: There were still Columbus Day parades, but they were more about Italian heritage and immigration, and even an indigenous people’s festival with no mention of the navigator.
docs.abstract: New York City's Columbus Day parade and celebration has slowly shifted its focus to be less about explorer and more about honoring Italian heritage and immigration in general; some choose instead to pay tribute to Native American people Christopher Columbus conquered.

headline.main: On Columbus Day in New York City, the Party Is No Longer Just for Him
headline.print_headline: Christopher Who? Day Is Less and Less About Columbus

docs.snippet: San Nicolas Island is the only California Channel Island that has not had a successful relay or solo swim. The Deep Enders began an attempt on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: San Nicolas Island is the only California Channel Island that has not had a successful relay or solo swim. The Deep Enders began an attempt on Monday.
docs.abstract: Deep Enders, group of elite swimmers from Buenaventura Swim Club in Ventura, Calif, prepare to attempt unprecedented feat of swimming 70-mile channel relay crossing from San Nicolas Island to Palos Verdes peninsula.

headline.main: Off the California Coast, a Swim Club’s Greatest Adventure
